definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: They also put forward proletariate internationalism and patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 提出了無產階級的國際主義和愛國主義的觀點。

sentences.english: Dr. norman bethune impersonates the spirit of proletarian internationalism.
sentences.chinese: 白求恩醫生體現了無產階級國際主義精神。

sentences.english: Europe's decline after World War II was immediately followed the era of American liberal internationalism.
sentences.chinese: 二戰後歐洲的衰落很快被美國自由國際主義所取代。

sentences.english: Maintaining world peace is our unshirkable internationalist duty.
sentences.chinese: 維護世界和平是我們義不容辭的國際主義義務。

sentences.english: Doctor Bethune's internationalist spirit is altogether admirable.
sentences.chinese: 白求恩大夫的國際主義精神十分可佩。

sentences.english: The great"Resist-America-Aid-Korea Movement"is a brilliant example of internationalism .
sentences.chinese: 偉大的抗美援朝運動是光輝的國際主義典範。

sentences.english: A internationalism was a fundamental canon of trotskyism.
sentences.chinese: 國際主義是托洛茨基主義的基本原則。
